## Voice.Listener.Error type

Error event listener. This should be the function signature of an event listener bound to the [Voice.Event.Error](./twilio-voice-react-native.voice_namespace.event_enum.md) event.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
type Error = (error: GenericError) => void;
```
